subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
We are writing to inform you that, following our board meeting, the management of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) has made the decision to lift the ban on your ATM card payment delivery order. We are pleased to inform you that we have also waived the initial charges associated with this delivery order and have adjusted the price rate to ensure that customers can receive their ATM card payment without any further delays.
We kindly advise you to take advantage of this opportunity to receive your long overdue payment. It has been a significant period of time since the payment was first initiated.
As instructed by the management, I am providing you with this information and updating you on the new delivery schedule. 
Please note that there is now a delivery price of $125.
 Furthermore, we strongly advise you to refrain from engaging in any further communication regarding the delivery of your ATM card funds with any other organization or office.
Once we receive your response regarding this message, the process of delivering your ATM card will commence promptly.
For easy communication, please contact The postmaster  at the following numbers.
OFFICE PHONE: +1(302) 752-2756
WHATSAPP NUMBER: + (806) 726-0824
EMAIL: 
vangaurdcouier@proton.me
Yours sincerely,
Kristalina Georgieva
IMF Managing Director .

subject: Re:  Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Kristalina Georgieva,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the lifting of the ban on my ATM card payment delivery order. I appreciate the update and the waiver of the initial charges. It's good to know that the price rate has been adjusted as well.

I would like to proceed with receiving my long overdue payment. Could you please provide me with more details about the new delivery schedule? I want to ensure that everything goes smoothly.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "delivery price"? Is there a cost associated with receiving my ATM card?

Lastly, I want to make sure that I am only communicating with the authorized personnel from IMF. Are there any specific contact details or protocols I should follow to ensure a secure and legitimate transaction?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Edward
